summary: After a heist in South Korea, a gang of 5+1 fly to Hong Kong to look into a heist, in a Macau casino, of a $30M diamond, planned by someone unreliable. He brings in HK thieves as well. Can anyone be trusted?
cast: Yoon-seok Kim|Jung-jae Lee|Hye-su Kim|Jun Ji-Hyun|Simon Yam|Kim Hae-sook|Dal-su Oh|Kim Soo-Hyun|Derek Tsang|Jin-mo Joo|Guk-seo Ki|Duk-moon Choi|Gook-hee Chae|Soo-jung Ye|Angelica Lee|Ha-kyun Shin|Kwang-hoon Na|Kang-woo Kim|Choi Jin-ho|Byung-wook Son|Joo-Myeong Kim|Min-mok Son|Won-gi Hong|Yeong-ju Seo|Geon-woo Ji|Mun-cheol Kwon|Yeong-min Kim|Tae-kyeong Park|Cheong-ok Kim|Young-woong Kim|Jun-nyeong Jang|Hae-Seong Lee|Ho-min Kim|Eun-ho Jo|Da-hye Kim|Eun-Chae Lee|Soo-Yeon Kim|Jun-woo Kim|Yoon-hun Jeong|Hyeon-mun Jang|Gyu-hoe Lee|Yuk-Ryong Kim|Yoo-su Lee|Hyo-sik Yeon|Ju-won Lee|Yoon-tae Kim|Jang Dong|Yeong-Cheol Yoo|Gyu-Seok Han|Sang-won Jo|Man Fong|Peter Chan|Tweety Wong|Wai-Nam So|Dai So|Cake Wong|Alex To|Brian Li|Johnny Lam|Myung-Hun Lee|Ling Yuen Lam|Icy Hui|Hing-Hang Chan|Roy Cheng|Kin Long Chan|Cinda Hui|Jack Law|Oscar Li|Man-Wai Luk|Vincent Chi|Sun-Hong Kim|Jong-seok Kim|Do-han Kim|Dong-jin Lee|Chi-ho Seong
director: Director: Dong-hoon Choi (as Choi Dong Hoon)
title: El gran golpe
